about_the_game:
Welcome to Magic Forest and Nimble Warrior - an intuitive 2D platformer game where you play as a nimble warrior. The platforms that the character must jump on appear and disappear at certain points in time according to a timer. Have time to jump over before the ground goes out from under your feet!

The charming pixel graphics and atmospheric music create a captivating yet relaxing game experience. The gameplay is addictive and engaging, but not annoying. This platformer is perfect to relax after a hard day. Intuitive controls allow you to immediately immerse yourself in the game without long introductions or complicated instructions.

Game Features:

Charming pixel art graphics
Atmospheric music
Engaging and addictive gameplay
Simple and intuitive controls
Dynamic platform challenges
